name: Fitimals
description:
My game for the Kiss Your Teacher Game Jam, that happened inside the Microsoft Innovation Center in Mons.

The Game is about fitting an animal inside of a silhouette, with a friend.

Find how your button affect the animal, communicate and prepare to get your your fun level rising!

How To

The game is designed to be played with another player, the player with the most awesome nose is the Left Player and the one with a great personality is the Right Player.

Left Player Control : Right Arrow

Right Player Control : Left Arrow

Music by Marcus Drake

Follow him on Twitter
